definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to behead (as form of capital punishment)/to chop
to progress (or increase, change etc) day by day/more (or better etc) with each passing day
in sequence, step by step (idiom); to make steady progress incrementally
progress step by step/gradual progress/to move forward (slowly)
amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS), aka motor neurone disease (MND)
to speed up gradually/faster and faster/(music) accelerando

sentences.english: Yan Liu gradually back heavy, Humilis cloud Lone Wild Goose far red winter sunset days.
sentences.chinese: 回頭煙柳漸重重，淡雲孤雁遠，寒日暮天紅。

sentences.english: It is also due to this "gradualness" that one is able to reconcile himself to his reduced circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 人之能堪受境遇的變衰，也全靠這“漸”的助力。

sentences.english: Ming, Grand court in the Central Division of the judicial power of the three gradually weakened.
sentences.chinese: 明末，大理寺在中央司法三司中權力漸弱化。

sentences.english: The bullae developed into ulcers which finally became scars.
sentences.chinese: 血泡漸形成瘍，最後自愈結痂爲疤。

sentences.english: The obtained polysilane -polyacrylate gradient films showed no macro-interface with the silicone content reducing gradually from the top surface to the bottom one.
sentences.chinese: 然後結構漸變成另一面富集有機硅聚合物的梯度膜。

sentences.english: Gradually evening, Wen-ching articles, poetry from and go.
sentences.chinese: 漸黃昏，清篇簡文，詩者去也。

sentences.english: A 9-year-old girl developed a progressive unsteady gait for one month.
sentences.chinese: 一個9歲大女孩漸進行步伐不穩。

sentences.english: Hence it is evident that life is sustained by “gradualness”．
sentences.chinese: 故可知人生是由“漸”維持的。

sentences.english: Bamboo Culture Festival has become popular in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年來，竹文化節漸興盛起來。

sentences.english: Law gradually back Chunhui, Vientiane before updating.
sentences.chinese: 律回春暉漸，萬象始更新。

sentences.english: The dramatic lighting gradually turns from light yellow to glaring red.
sentences.chinese: 舞臺上的燈光由淡黃色漸變成耀眼的紅色。

sentences.english: As after sunset fadein in the west.
sentences.chinese: 落霞消殘，漸沉入西方的天際。

sentences.english: Season is still hot days, gradually turned again to seasons of autumn.
sentences.chinese: 季節漸轉天仍熱，時令又至秋老虎。

sentences.english: On the death of the king, reaction set in.
sentences.chinese: 國王去世後，反對派的勢力漸漲起來。

sentences.english: It is by this " gradualness" that the Creator deceives all humans.
sentences.chinese: 造物主騙人的手段，也莫如“漸”。

definition: to hasten/to hurry/to walk fast/to approach/to tend towards/to converge
to follow/to comply with/varying according to.../to allow/subsequently
to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin
warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if
